Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth $12000. Considering the high quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you for $13000. I understand that every dollar counts, but I assure you, investing in this product will provide substantial returns in terms of functionality and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information about how this product can benefit you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
